entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
